attributes.action: bestow a knighthood, at the earliest possible opportunity, on Henry Allingham and Harry Patch.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely a knighthood is the least this country owes these last remaining heros of WW1

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
